summary: Build a website and mobile app for the YouTube channel “Keep Going Classes” to serve students, share articles, open admissions, and provide contact information.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive website/web app for the YouTube channel "Keep Going Classes" with the tagline presented in English and clear navigation for students.
Implement an Articles section where students can browse and read published articles.
Add an admin-only interface to create, edit, publish/unpublish, and delete articles using Internet Identity authentication.
Implement an Admissions feature allowing students to submit admission/enrollment requests via a form.
Add a Contact section/page that shows the creator's contact information and allows easy copying/launching (e.g., click-to-email, click-to-call when appropriate).
Apply a cohesive, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an educational/coaching brand and enforce it consistently across all pages.
Provide a "mobile app-like" experience within the responsive web app (PWA-style basics): add installable metadata and a home-screen icon so students can save it to their device.
Add a simple Home page that explains what Keep Going Classes offers (academics + competitive exam preparation) and provides clear calls to action for Articles and Admissions.
Update the Contact page to display the user’s provided contact numbers: WhatsApp: 9889144312 and Phone: 9838784245.
Remove/replace any placeholder contact phone number currently shown on the Contact page so only the provided numbers are presented as the primary phone/WhatsApp contacts.
